articles.title: Lea Michele reveals son is 'well' after 'scary health issue' - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'He's well, thank you so much. He's good,' she told Entertainment Tonight on Tuesday at the Variety Power Of Women event. He fell ill two weeks ago, which cause her to have to miss Funny Girl shows.
articles.content:
